__inputs.description: The third server name replica set (atlas-MONGO_ID-shard-00-00.DNS_PREFIX.mongodb.net)

description: This dashboard allows you to fetch process, database, and disk logs from MongoDB Atlas API

panels.content:
## MongoDB Atlas Dashboard

This dashboard uses [Grafana MongoDB Atlas Logs Datasource](https://github.com/valiton/grafana-mongodb-atlas-datasource) and allows to fetch process, database and disk logs from [MongoDB Atlas API](https://docs.atlas.mongodb.com/reference/api/monitoring-and-logs) in your Grafana dashboard. All metrics available on MongoDB Atlas API are liste on [Measurement Types](https://docs.opsmanager.mongodb.com/current/reference/api/measures/measurement-types/)

**ATTENTION!!!** The datasource **doesn't support** Grafana's template variable (see: [#25](https://github.com/valiton/grafana-mongodb-atlas-datasource/issues/25))
panels.title: Information

panels.description: The approximate number of hours available in the primary's replication oplog. If a secondary is behind real-time by more than this amount, it cannot catch up and will require a full resync.
panels.title: Queries

panels.description: The approximate number of hours available in the primary's replication oplog. If a secondary is behind real-time by more than this amount, it cannot catch up and will require a full resync.
panels.title: Commands

panels.description: The approximate number of seconds the secondary is behind the primary in write application. Only accurate if the lag is larger than 1-2 seconds, as the precision of this statistic is limited.
panels.title: Average Replication lag

panels.description: The approximate number of hours available in the primary's replication oplog. If a secondary is behind real-time by more than this amount, it cannot catch up and will require a full resync.
panels.title: Replication Oplog Window

panels.description: Average execution time in milliseconds per read, write, or command operation during a selected time period.
panels.title: Op Execution Time - read

panels.description: Average execution time in milliseconds per read, write, or command operation during a selected time period.
panels.title: Op Execution Time - write

panels.description: Average execution time in milliseconds per read, write, or command operation during a selected time period.
panels.title: Op Execution Time - cmd
